content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron ore mining and smelting setup at (15.5, 70.5) - UPDATED
- Electric mining drill at (15.5, 70.5) producing 42 iron ore per minute
- Wooden chest at (15.5, 72.5) containing 44 iron ore
- Burner inserter at (15.5, 73.5) with output blocked by ground items
- Stone furnace at (16.0, 76.0) with no ingredients despite chest contents
- Small electric pole at (13.5, 70.5) providing power
- Current configuration shows alignment issues between inserter drop (15.5, 74.5) and furnace input (16.0, 76.0)

### Power generation setup at (-9.5, -0.5)
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 0.5) operational (99.95 water)
- Boiler at (-5.0, 3.5) with 3 coal remaining
- Steam engine at (-0.5, 3.5) generating 13500.0 energy
- Pipe network fully functional with water temperature at 15°C and steam at 165°C
- Power pole network properly connected at 5964000 voltage

## ERROR TIPS

### Persistent inserter-furnace alignment issues (critical)
- Inserter drop position (15.5,74.5) doesn't reach furnace input (16.0,76.0) - adjust positions to be adjacent
- Output blocked warnings continue (8 total occurrences) - verify clear path from inserter to furnace

### Furnace operation problems (updated)
- No ingredients reaching furnace despite chest contents (7 total occurrences)
- Verify inserter fuel and orientation (burner inserter has 9 coal)
- Check furnace fuel supply (currently has 20 coal)

### Entity placement verification
- Repeated placement of same entities without fixing alignment (6 total occurrences)
- Clear ground items before testing configurations (4 corrections made)

### Power system monitoring
- Boiler fuel running low (3 coal remaining) - maintain at least 10 coal buffer
- Steam engine operating at full capacity (13500 energy)

### Production diagnostics
- Iron ore accumulation in chest indicates smelting bottleneck
- Throughput remains at 42 iron ore/minute despite repeated adjustments

### Configuration testing protocol
- Test changes for full production cycle before making new adjustments
- Verify all entity connections after placement (5 missed verifications)
